designer.description: As a designer, I specialize in creating intuitive interfaces and engaging user experiences.

experience.description: Developed responsive interfaces for an educational platform, conducted user testing, and optimized designs for student convenience.
Designed interfaces for web courses, created interactive elements and visual scenarios to enhance user engagement.
Contributed to the development of interfaces for educational projects, improved the mobile user experience, and created visual concepts for special projects.
Created branding materials, visual identities, and marketing collateral for clients.

education.institution: Saint Petersburg Stieglitz State Academy of Art and Design
education.description: Studied art history, composition theory, cultural epochs, and artistic styles. Conducted in-depth research on art from various periods and regions, as well as the intersection of art and technology.

developer.description: As a developer, I specialize in front-end technologies and creating interactive web applications.

experience.description: Developed complex interfaces for managing smart greenhouses, optimized application performance, and integrated RESTful APIs to support IoT devices.
Developed and maintained full-stack solutions for a women's lingerie store, implementing features using Vue 3, Pinia, and Cloudinary.
Created custom web solutions, including 3D graphics integration, responsive interfaces, and scalable project support.
